1.title: Pay What You Can

episode of.title: How to Live Like a Millionaire When You're a Million Short (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: Marilyn Anderson describes how you can go to some theaters in many cities - without spending a bundle.

2.title: Fashionista or Fashion-ugga?

episode of.title: How to Live Like a Millionaire When You're a Million Short (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: Want to wear designer clothes without spending designer prices? Marilyn Anderson tells you how to be a Fashionista instead of a Fashion-ugga.

3.title: Wanna Get Prescriptions for Less?

episode of.title: How to Live Like a Millionaire When You're a Million Short (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: Learn how to spend less for prescription drugs. Anderson gives great tips on how to get drugs for less - even less than with your insurance.

4.title: Happy Hour

episode of.title: How to Live Like a Millionaire When You're a Million Short (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: If you like upscale restaurants, but not upscale prices - Anderson gives some great tips on amazing Happy Hour prices at places near you.

5.title: Free Wine, Food, Fun & Art

episode of.title: How to Live Like a Millionaire When You're a Million Short (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: Marilyn Anderson tells how to have a free night of fun, culture, wine and food.

6.title: Broke on a Bad Hair Day?

episode of.title: How to Live Like a Millionaire When You're a Million Short (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: Getting your hair done can cost a bundle. But it doesn't have to. Discover great ways to get great deals on haircuts, color and more.

7.title: Are you a FOODIE?

episode of.title: How to Live Like a Millionaire When You're a Million Short (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot: Marilyn Anderson gives info on how to get discounts at restaurants all over the country.

8.title: Feathering Your Nest with the Best for Less

episode of.title: How to Live Like a Millionaire When You're a Million Short (TV Series 2016– )

8.plot: Discover how to get expensive furniture and home accessories for less.

9.title: Wrap Your Brain Around a Free Week in Spain

episode of.title: How to Live Like a Millionaire When You're a Million Short (TV Series 2016– )

9.plot: Discover how you can get a six night stay at a 4-star resort in Spain for FREE.
